name: yaar
description: Reactive AI interface where the AI decides what to show and do next

scripts.build:exe: pnpm build:exe:prepare && pnpm build:exe:bundle && pnpm build:exe:assets
scripts.build:exe:bundle: bun build packages/server/src/exe-entry-claude.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile=dist/yaar-claude.exe --minify --define __YAAR_BUNDLED=true && bun build packages/server/src/exe-entry-codex.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile=dist/yaar-codex.exe --minify --define __YAAR_BUNDLED=true
scripts.build:exe:bundle:linux: bun build packages/server/src/exe-entry-claude.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile=dist/yaar-claude --minify --define __YAAR_BUNDLED=true && bun build packages/server/src/exe-entry-codex.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile=dist/yaar-codex --minify --define __YAAR_BUNDLED=true
scripts.build:exe:bundle:macos: bun build packages/server/src/exe-entry-claude.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile=dist/yaar-claude --minify --define __YAAR_BUNDLED=true && bun build packages/server/src/exe-entry-codex.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile=dist/yaar-codex --minify --define __YAAR_BUNDLED=true
